title: Need to file a claim for phone that won't keep charge and is showing a empty battery w question mark
content: I have tried a hard reset and called technical support. The phone will shut off automatically and when placed on the charger it will display a battery bank empty with a question mark. Ive had this phone for less than a year and this is the first time this has occurred.
category: Battery and Power, Google Pixel 4 XL
